originalText.text: Dr Sanders was kind, informative and solution oriented. He listened. He empathized. And he gave me a strategy that I feel good about as I move forward to feeling better.  He is very special.

text.text: Dr Sanders was kind, informative and solution oriented. He listened. He empathized. And he gave me a strategy that I feel good about as I move forward to feeling better.  He is very special.

originalText.text: He reviewed my chart carefully and Took plenty of time with me. He was  knowledgable and kind. I highly recommend Dr Sanders to anyone looking for a pulmonologist.

text.text: He reviewed my chart carefully and Took plenty of time with me. He was  knowledgable and kind. I highly recommend Dr Sanders to anyone looking for a pulmonologist.

originalText.text: Dr. Sanders is my favorite doctor. I have been under his care since 2002. He is smart,  caring, resourceful and an excellent diagnostician. He thoroughly explains what's going on when we both look at X-rays, comparing current images with earlier ones. I have emailed him on weekends when necessary, and  received an immediate response. I feel grateful that he is my doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Sanders is very personable, kind, patient who listens to the concerns of his patients. He is thorough and always follows through in my mind going the extra mile. He's always calm and pleasant and makes me feel comfortable in the worst of times.

originalText.text:
Dr. Abraham Sanders is both a professional and caring Doctor.
Dr. Abraham Sanders was my Father's doctor as well as my doctor.
Dr. Abraham Sanders explains always any concern I may have regarding my health always.
Dr. Abraham Sanders is experienced and a Great Doctor.
